Title: Hose It Down
Description:
With the flame restored, you can see the extent of contamination to the fishing hole. Kobyss and frogs have left heaps of strange goo that pollutes the shoreline.

We need your help to clean up this gooey blight! 

I have a specially modified harvester equipped with a water barrel. Use this device to spray water on the goo piles and clean the shore of this contamination.
ObjectivesText: Activate Baeny the Barrel and use the hose to wash away 30 Contaminating Goo.
